original_text: While Aaron was speaking to the whole Israelite community, they looked toward the desert, and there was the glory of the Lord appearing in the cloud.
korean_text: 아론이 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중에게 말하매 그들이 광야를 바라보니 여호와의 영광이 구름 속에 나타나더라

sentences.original_text: While Aaron was speaking to the whole Israelite community
sentences.korean_translation: 아론이 온 이스라엘 회중에게 말할 때에

sentences.original_text: and there was the glory of the Lord
